Translations.Text: Ayi Mukama Katonda waffe tukkiriza ebyo byewassa era netugoberera omubaka, kale tuwandiike mu bajulizi
(Abayudaaya) baasala enkwe ne Katonda n’asalawo okulemesa enkwe zaabwe anti bulijjo Katonda mulungi okusinga abo abasala enkwe

Jjukira ekiseera Katonda bweyagamba nti; Owange ggwe Isa nze ngenda kukutuukiririza ekyo kyenakuwandiikako, era ngenda kusitula nkuleete gyendi era nkutukuze kwabo abaakaafuwala, abo abakugoberera ngenda kubassa waggulu waabo abakafuwala okutuusa ku lunaku lw’enkomerero oluvanyuma gyendi mwenna gyemugenda okudda, olwo ndyoke mbalamule mwebyo byemwayawukanangamu
Bbo Abaakaafuwala ngenda kubabonereza n’ebibonerezo ebikakali ku nsi ne ku nkomerero, era tebagenda kufuna baakubataasa
Naye bbo, abo Abakkiriza nebakola emirimu emirungi (Katonda) agenda kubajjuliza empeera zaabwe, anti bulijjo Katonda tayagala bakozi ba bibi
Ebyo tubikusomera Ggwe (Nabbi Muhammad) nga byamububonero n’okubuulirira okwamagezi
Mazima entondebwa ya Isa ewa Katonda efaanana nentondebwa ya Adam, yamutonda nga amugya mu ttaka oluvanyuma naamugamba nti beera n’aba omuntu
Ago nno geemazima agava eri Mukama Katondawo, kale tobeeranga mu babuusabuusa

Singa omuntu yenna akuwakanya kukino, oluvanyuma lwa mazima agakujjidde ggwe gamba nti mujje tuyite abaana baffe n'abaana ba mmwe, bakyala baffe ne bakyala ba mmwe, naffe fennyini nammwe olwo nno tusabe ekikolimo kya Katonda kituuke ku balimba
